page.title: 04Schools
page.content: I go to{Warren Hills Primary School (384 pupils) which is one of three schools on a campus at 456148.I started school the term after I was five.My school is 'open-plan' unlike {Broomleys School}down the road (401). When I am 11 I will go to{Castle Rock {High School}(705) which is just the other side of our football pitch.I will stay there for three years. At 14 I will move on to{King Edward {VII Community College}(1107),which is next to the High School,for two to four years.I already visit this school for swimming and the theatre.The Community College runs courses in the evening as well as during the day. Adults and children can use the College for sports,crafts and academic classes. A lot of my friends go to clubs at the College and some went to Denmark with the Gymnastics Club.
